collectibles.name: Solid Gold Amulet
collectibles.flavorText: A valuable piece of jewelery stolen centuries ago from the Merchant's Guild.

collectibles.name: Large Decorative Key
collectibles.flavorText: A solid gold key. Carved in the plaque is the name of a merchant from Raburro.

collectibles.name: Valuable Spices
collectibles.flavorText: Elemental magic gives this spice some extra heat. Very popular in Maeles Town.

items.name: Ward of the Black Dragon King

collectibles.name: Vampire Heart
collectibles.flavorText: The still-beating heart of a vampire. It reeks of darkness.

collectibles.name: Crystal of Air
collectibles.flavorText: It's hard to tell, but there are pockets of air in this crystal.

collectibles.name: Red Dragon Scale
collectibles.flavorText: A gleaming ruby-like scale. It's warm to the touch.

collectibles.name: Cursed Orb
collectibles.flavorText: Every crack looks like it opens to a void.

collectibles.name: Jewel-Encrusted Cup
collectibles.flavorText: A very expensive looking cup. I wonder what the merchant in Raburro would pay for this?

collectibles.name: Merchant's Ledger
collectibles.flavorText: A long list of many valuable transactions.

collectibles.name: Bottle of Ketchup
collectibles.flavorText: Spot was always prepared for adventurers.

collectibles.name: Leviathan Egg
collectibles.flavorText: An ivory egg. It occasionally stirs with activity, though it's hard to discern why.

collectibles.name: Snowbeast Skull
collectibles.flavorText: What are you, the Bone Collector?

collectibles.name: Gorgon Snake
collectibles.flavorText: The Necromancers of olde would oft use artifacts like this to summon powerful monsters.

collectibles.name: Basilisk Scale
collectibles.flavorText: This once jet black and red scale has now turned to stone.

collectibles.name: Ancient Tablet
collectibles.flavorText: The tablet comes from a lost civilization deep beneath Vocalnus. Artifacts of this nature are prized by merchants.

collectibles.name: Twisted Appendage
collectibles.flavorText: One of many lost limbs from your battle with the Fate-Twisted Lake Monstrosity.

collectibles.name: Splendid Dragon Keyring
collectibles.flavorText: Full of rings to the previous owner's hidden treasure hoards. If only they had left a map.

collectibles.name: Overflowing Stein
collectibles.flavorText: No matter how many times you empty this magic mug of ale, it always fills to the brim when you open the lid.

collectibles.name: Ring of Understanding
collectibles.flavorText: A gift from Jaunthes's brother. Unfortunately it was too little, too late.

collectibles.name: Lapis Lazuli Statue
collectibles.flavorText: The Transmuter tried to turn dirt into a solid gold statue of herself. She was less than pleased with the result, but was too vain to get rid of it.

collectibles.name: Comfortable Footwraps
collectibles.flavorText: Considering how much walking you do, keeping your feet happy is a priority.

collectibles.name: Missing Cog
collectibles.flavorText: Once a part of Steel Gearshaft, an oppressive Clockborg warlord who ruled the Cabran desert.

collectibles.name: Wild Magic Ladle
collectibles.flavorText: A cackle emits from the ladle when stirring witches' brews.

collectibles.name: Titanic Serpent Skin
collectibles.flavorText: You could mount this on your wall, but you would need a bigger wall.
